document_data.mainbody:
The Gilded Horseshoe was an inn located in the town of Longsaddle during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
thumb|300px|A map showing the Gilded Horseshoe in the center of Longsaddle.
The Gilded Horseshoe sat near the middle of the town south of an open market and the Saddle Pond.
